column1: right ventricle, M, 84 years old. Positive buffer for neoCOVID-19.
High fever, recent onset of moderate respiratory failure since 2 weeks.
computed/computerized tomography shows typical signs of interstitial pneumonia: widespread crazy paving, areas of ground-glass with aspects of confluence at the bases.
Thin bilateral pleural effusion and small sub-centimetric mediastinal oval lymph nodes are associated, unusual findings in the neoCOVID-19.
